content: capreoli by sempernox © psyknitter blogspot com materials light fingering weight about 250-300 yards size 2us 16 circular needles size 2us double-pointed needles stitch markers tapestry needle size 22 head circumference gauge 9 stitches per 1 in k2p2 pre-blocking glossary k = knit p = purl k-f/b = knit through front and back of same stitch 1 stitch increased dd = double decrease slip 2 stitches together as if to knit knit the next stitch pass slipped stitches over the knitted stitch 2 stitches decreased ssk = slip 2 stitches one at a time knitwise return stitches to left-hand needle in turned position and knit them together through the back loops 1 stitch decreased k2tog = knit 2 stitches together 1 stitch decreased directions using circular needles cast on 144 stitches place marker and join in round next row *k2 p2 repeat from * until end of round continue in pattern for 1 5 increase row while k-ing every stitch increase evenly 40 stitches 184 total stitches start chevron pattern row 1 k every stitch to end row 2 * k-f/b k9 dd k9 k-f/b place marker *repeat to end continue in chevron pattern until desired length sample hat shown measures 8 from cast on edge ending with row 1 of chevron pattern crown shaping decreases 16 stitches decreased per decrease round note switch to double-pointed needles and remove stitch markers when necessary round 1 *k-f/b ssk k7 dd k7 k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 2 and all even row k all stitches round 3 *k-f/b ssk k6 dd k6 k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 5 *k-f/b ssk k5 dd k5 k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 7 *k-f/b ssk k4 dd k4 k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 9 *k-f/b ssk k3 dd k3 k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 11 *k-f/b ssk k2 dd k2 k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 13 *k-f/b ssk k1 dd k1 k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 15 *k-f/b ssk dd k2tog k-f/b *repeat to end round 17 *k ssk slip 1 k2tog k *repeat to end round 19 *ssk slip1 k2tog *repeat to end 24 stitches remain cut yarn pull through remaining
